price: Isaan boonan nijedhan “nuti hunduu isheedhuma keessa jirra; Rabbiin dhugumatti gidduu gabrootaatti murteesseera”.
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُلّٞ فِيهَآ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ حَكَمَ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla alladhīna is'takbarū innā kullun fīhā inna al-laha qad ḥakama bayna al-ʿibādi
